name: Project Purge
description:
This is a prototype of game made for june july jackpot jam. Thus only contain ONE LEVEL because time period of jam and can be continued further.

You play as Pete where you wake up in an unknown place and find out about project purge and try to escape as creature tries to kill you.Use you stealth to Escape him before he gets you!

The theme(s) of jam 

1)Heatwave: the machine uses heatwave to transfer radiated bio-organism in atmosphere

2)Name of character "Julie" starts with J.

3) researchers were on summer job to complete the purge.

4) Juxtaposition: instead of destroying world researchers destroyed themselves.

All assets were made in jam period.

Sfx from freesounds(cco)

Play with headphones for best experience
